content.text:
# List of rivers of the Dominican Republic

This is a list of rivers in the Dominican Republic, arranged in clockwise order around the island starting in the northwest corner, with respective tributaries indented under each larger stream's name.
*Dajabón River (Massacre River)
*Yaque del Norte River
**Mao River
*Yuna River
**Camú River
*Guamira River
** Maimón River
*Yuma River
*Chavón River
*Soco River
*Iguamo River (Higuamo River)
*Ozama River
**Isabela River
**Yabacao River
*Haina River
*Arroyo Blanco
*Ocoa River
*Nizao River
*Yaque del Sur River
**Limón River
**San Juan River
*Pedernales River
*Artibonite River
**Macasía River
**Libón River
**Bao river
*Baní River
References
* The Columbia Gazetteer of North America. 2093
*, GEOnet Names Server
*[http://www.lib.utexas.edu/maps/americas/dominican_republic_pol_04.jpg CIA map]
External links
*
* [http://indrhi.gob.do/ Instituto Nacional de Recursos Hidráulicos (INDRHI)]. Site of the Institute of water resources of the Dominican Republic.
